comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of March 22, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50F1FFB385F13738... indicates that Brown and Gardner played for the national amateur 18.2 balkline billiard championship. Edward W. Gardner won.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a biography in Wikipedia on him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_W._Gardner
